images.name: Phoenix Suns vs. Brooklyn Nets: Game Highlights
images.caption: Phoenix Suns vs. Brooklyn Nets: Game Highlights

articles.description: — Devin Booker scored 32 points in his 200th career 30-point performance, Kevin Durant added 24 against his...
articles.headline: Booker and Durant lead the Suns to a 108-84 victory over the short-handed Nets

images.name: Could Quin Snyder become the next Boomers coach?
images.caption: Olgun Uluc provides an update on the Boomers coaching search, with Atlanta Hawks coach Quin Snyder in contention for the role.

articles.description: Olgun Uluc provides an update on the Boomers coaching search, with Atlanta Hawks coach Quin Snyder in contention for the role.
articles.headline: Could Quin Snyder become the next Boomers coach?

images.name: Cason Wallace throws it down for the Thunder
images.caption: Cason Wallace throws it down for the Thunder

articles.description: Cason Wallace throws it down for the Thunder
articles.headline: Cason Wallace throws it down for the Thunder

images.name: Draymond Green [600x400]
images.credit: Photo by Noah Graham/NBAE via Getty Images

articles.description: Warriors star Draymond Green has apologized for punching former teammate Jordan Poole and says it is time to move on from the incident that fractured their locker room over two years ago.
articles.headline: Green expounds on latest Poole apology, wants him to move on

images.name: Kevin Durant [600x400]
images.caption: Suns star Kevin Durant, back at Barclays Center for the second time since he was traded in 2023, said he still feels "love" when he returns to Brooklyn.
images.credit: Photo by David L. Nemec/NBAE via Getty Images

articles.description: Suns star Kevin Durant, back for his second trip to Barclays Center since being traded, said he is proud of what the Nets were building despite the "dysfunction" that prevented him, Kyrie Irving and James Harden from taking the court together.
articles.headline: Kevin Durant still feels 'love' in Brooklyn despite chaotic stint

images.name: Ja Morant grabs lob out of the air, gets assist on other end
images.caption: Ja Morant snatches an alley-oop attempt out of the air, then gets an assist on Jaylen Wells' 3-pointer.

articles.description: Ja Morant snatches an alley-oop attempt out of the air, then gets an assist on Jaylen Wells' 3-pointer.
articles.headline: Ja Morant grabs lob out of the air, gets assist on other end
